passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal {{as|{{rd|150 to 200 for 11|150*0.8 to 200*0.8 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}} on-hit, increased by {{pp|0 to 75 by 5|0 to 100|key=%|color=health|type=target's '''missing''' health|key1=%}}, for up to {{as|{{rd|150*1.75 to 200*1.75 for 11|150*0.8*1.75 to 200*0.8*1.75 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}}.
passives.name: Bring It Down
